result.reasoning: Filename includes 'parameters', suggesting a parameter dictionary/codebook. The columns (Parameter, Data Source, Description, Unit) form a classic definition table rather than per-patient/per-event records. Sample values in 'Parameter' are variable names (caseid, subjectid, casestart) and 'Description' contains long explanatory text (avg_text_length ~42), indicating documentation of fields and units, not transactional measurements.
